name: cleo wide brim fedora
notes:
move over beanies, this packable sun hat is about to be the most functional, stylish crochet project your head has ever seen. whether you’re globe trotting or walking your dog, you’ll feel like a goddess of diy wearing your completely handmade fedora.

lion brand rewind yarn ensures the cleo fedora is moldable, comfy and surprisingly lightweight. skills required include single crochet and working in the round.

this ad-free pdf includes written instructions, a photo tutorial and a link to a step-by-step video tutorial as well as a video tutorial for adding an optional inexpensive wire to stabilize the brim. the photos are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink.

the combination of style and function might just make this your go-to crochet project for the warmer months! 

if you like the cleo fedora, you'll also love the tate rancher hat.

this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew.

skill level - advanced beginner

sizing:
small - fits 21-22” heads
large - fits 22.5-23.5” heads
